title: The Art of Finishing
dot:
digraph ProjectHydra{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue, fontname="Arial"]; Start[label="Quiet Saturday Afternoon" shape=circle fillcolor=lightgreen];Challenges[label="Deciding on Unfinished Projects"];UnfinishedProjects[label="Graveyard of Ideas
- Half-Implemented Ideas
- Stalled Works-in-Progress"];HydraEffect[label="The Hydra Project Effect
- New Challenges Appear"];Frustration[label="Feelings of Frustration
- Nagging Sense of Inadequacy"]; Allure[label="Allure of the Endless Project
- Infinite Possibility
- Comfort in Ongoing Projects
- Fear of Finality
- Illusion of Productivity"];Cost[label="Cost of Never Finishing
- Mental Weight
- Lack of Skill Growth
- No Joy of Shipping"]; Strategies[label="Strategies for Taming the Project Hydra
1. Define 'Done'
2. Embrace MVP
3. Time-Box Projects
4. Practice Finishing Small Things
5. Separate Ideation from Implementation
6. Celebrate Completions
7. Embrace Accountability"]; PathForward[label="The Path Forward
- Challenge of Consistency
- Growth as a Developer"]; Start->Challenges;Challenges->UnfinishedProjects;UnfinishedProjects->HydraEffect;HydraEffect->Frustration; Frustration->Allure;Frustration->Cost;Allure->Strategies;Cost->Strategies;Strategies->PathForward;}

title: Ask HN: Who is hiring? (September 2024)
Upgrading a Toshiba NAS HDD Firmware on Linux
dot:
digraph FirmwareUpgrade{node[shape=box, style=filled, color=lightgrey, fontname="Arial"];edge[fontname="Arial"];subgraph cluster_0{label="Upgrading Toshiba NAS HDD Firmware on Linux";style=filled;color=lightblue;TLDR[label="Reversed Windows firmware updater for use on Linux", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];Context[label="Bought Toshiba HDWG480 HDD
Checked for firmware update
Found version 0602 available", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];Goals[label="Goals:
1. Understand update file source
2. Reverse engineer flashing process", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];Reversing[label="Reversed Windows Updater:
- Identified files
- Grepped for URLs
- Found update URL in registry", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];Parsing[label="Parsed update file:
- Identified relevant file: sk060202.ftd", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];Understanding[label="Understood update process:
- Verified drive
- Sent firmware using ATA commands", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral];Updating[label="Performed update on NAS drive:
- Used hdparm with mode 3
- Verified firmware revision", shape=ellipse, color=lightcoral]; TLDR->Context->Goals->Reversing->Parsing->Understanding->Updating;}}
